column4: can anybody tell me how to run two concurrent desktops for two different users on Ubuntu Lucid Lynx?
before there was a way with Alt-Ctrl-F9 but doesnt seem to work anymore. I do startx -- :1 as the other user but it goes blank after i change users
You mean two users using the same CPU with different monitors / keyboard / mouse?
same monitor. Log in as two diff users on same system with two different x sessions each using a different wm
